thread.title: India Wants to Replace Windows with the Debian-Based BOSS
thread.title_full: India Wants to Replace Windows with the Debian-Based BOSS - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: India Wants to Replace Windows with the Debian-Based BOSS
text: The Indian government is working on its operating system named BOSS, and it's planning on ditching any kind of Microsoft-related application. India is not the first country out there that wants to stop being dependent on Windows or other Microsoft products. It's also not the first one that wants to make its own operating system, but that hasn't always gone according to plan. China wanted at some point to do the same thing, but it's not an easy task. In fact, it takes yea... Â»
